text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI PL62 7RC-001 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce MX150 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Avoid the MSI PL62 7RC-001 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce MX150 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The Intel Core i7 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI PL62 7RC-001 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce MX150 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The Intel Core i7 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the MSI PL62 7RC-001 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce MX150 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI PL62 7RC-001 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce MX150 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
